The problem was resolved after another bypass of synchronization. When making changes in the Bidspirit portal, the changes on the site should appear within the next 1 hour.

In the controller, we save the data for the adjacent tables casino_game_to_themes and casino_game_themes also for casino_game_features without problems: For example, we will consider only casino_game_themes.
В контроллере данные для смежных таблиц casino_game_to_themes and casino_game_themes also for casino_game_features сохраняем без проблем: Для примера будем рассматривать только casino_game_themes.
To display data in the UI, we do not use the postmeta table, having written metaless fields in the CasinoGame model, we take the data directly from casino_game.
Для отображения данных в UI мы не используем таблицу postmeta, прописав в модели CasinoGame поля metaless, данные берём на прямую из casino_game.
